Package com.tsuboin.vault

Class PasswordVault

java.lang.Object
com.tsuboin.vault.PasswordVault
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vault
public class PasswordVault
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vault
PasswordVault is given username, password, and the name of a website to store for a user. When the user so desires, they can retrieve the password for a site, update the password, or add a new site. PasswordVault stores passwords encrypted.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Narissa Tsuboi

      Parameters:
      cipher - CaesarCipher object

  • Method Details

    • addNewUser

      public void addNewUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws InvalidUsernameException, InvalidPasswordException, DuplicateUserException
      Add a new user to the vault (with no site passwords). For example, a username and password is supplied, and the system does no verification or checking except that the username and password must be in correct formats, and the username cannot already be in the vault.
      Specified by:
      addNewUser in interface Vault
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be added
      password - The password to be associated with this user
      Throws:
      InvalidUsernameException - The supplied username is invalid
      InvalidPasswordException - The supplied password is invalid
      DuplicateUserException - The username is already in the vault

    • addNewSite

      public java.lang.String addNewSite​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sitename) throws DuplicateSiteException, UserNotFoundException, UserLockedOutException, PasswordMismatchException, InvalidSiteException
      Adds a new site to the vault for the user, generates, stores, and returns a password for that site. For example, if a user is creating an account at the site "amazon" for the first time, he/she calls the vault with the site name, and the site makes up a password for the user/site, returns the (plain text password to the user, and stores the (encrypted) password -- all stored passwords in the vault.
      Specified by:
      addNewSite in interface Vault
      Parameters:
      username - The username requesting the new site password
      password - Password for the username
      sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
      Returns:
      A new (plaintext) password for the requested site
      Throws:
      DuplicateSiteException - There is already a site stored for this user
      UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
      UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
      PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password
      InvalidSiteException - The site name supplied is invalid

    • updateSitePassword

      public java.lang.String updateSitePassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sitename) throws SiteNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, UserLockedOutException, PasswordMismatchException
      Generate, store, and return an updated password for a site associated with the user. For example, the user wants to change his/her password on "amazon," and the system generates a new password, stores an encrypted version for the user, and returns the plaintext version.
      Specified by:
      updateSitePassword in interface Vault
      Parameters:
      username - The username requesting the new site password
      password - Password for the username
      sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
      Returns:
      An updated (plaintext) password for the requested site
      Throws:
      SiteNotFoundException - The user has no password associated with this site
      UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
      UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
      PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password

    • retrieveSitePassword

      public java.lang.String retrieveSitePassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sitename) throws SiteNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, UserLockedOutException, PasswordMismatchException
      Retrieve the (plaintext) password for the user for the requested site. For example, the user supplies the name of a site, and if she has a stored password for the site, it is returned in plain text.
      Specified by:
      retrieveSitePassword in interface Vault
      Parameters:
      username - The username requesting the site password
      password - Password for the username
      sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
      Returns:
      The (plaintext) password for the requested site
      Throws:
      SiteNotFoundException - The user has no password associated with this site
      UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
      UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
      PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password

    • incrementMapCount

      private static <K> void incrementMapCount​(java.util.HashMap<K,​java.lang.Integer> map, K key)
      Increments the Integer value stored at teh given key.
      Type Parameters:
      K - accepts Strings, Integers, etc
      Parameters:
      map - Hashmap
      key - key to update the value for

    • generateRandomPassword

      private java.lang.String generateRandomPassword()
      Creates a password between 6-15 characters in length with 1 dig, 1 uppercase character, 1, special character, and characters a-z.
      Returns:
      String representing a password

    • loginExceptions

      private void loginExceptions​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws UserNotFoundException, UserLockedOutException, PasswordMismatchException
      Checks username and password for UserNotFound, PasswordMismatch, and UserLockedOut.
      Parameters:
      username - The username requesting the site password
      password - Password for the username
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
      UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
      PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password
